plot: My Larsen is a documentarian in her early thirties. Self-centered and assertive, she likes to challenge and provoke her surroundings. She takes on an unusual assignment to make a film about the conservative township of Ravnsborg, but she learns there is a dark side to life in this small town. Someone is trying to cover up a terrible secret and they will stop at nothing, even murder, to keep My from discovering the truth.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Fluerne på væggen

lists.title: Marianne Faithfull Drinking Jagermeister During 80 Days
